territory.notes: Became independent on October 1, 1960, as a member of the British Commonwealth. Officially became a republic on October 1, 1963. The northern portions of the UN Trust Territory of the British Cameroons joined Nigeria in June 1961 following a plebiscite in the British Cameroons. The “Republic of Biafra” declared its independence from Nigeria in 1967 and attempted to secede, but was defeated after three years of civil war.
